name: Hours of the Day
description:
Take over the life of an aspiring musician as they navigate the challenges of trying to lead a fulfilling life, while keeping everyone they know happy. 

Click on the emails on your phone to see the events your friends and family have invited you to. By adding these events to the calendar, you can boost your relationships, by ignoring them, you let your relationships deteriorate. There's not enough hours in a day to do everything, so some sacrifices will have to be made. What will you choose to preserve, and what will you let slide? How long can you keep it all together?

Everybody wants something different, so make sure to keep your eye on the bars at the bottom of the screen. If even one of them is empty, it's game over!

--

Created using Unity / Visual Studio
Font: Conformity
Audio: sfxr, Bosca Ceoil
Visuals: paint.net, aseprite

Thanks for playing!
